name: Pizza
description: A dish made of dough, tomato sauce, and various toppings such as cheese, vegetables, and meats. It is usually baked in an oven.

name: Burgers
description: A sandwich consisting of a cooked patty of ground meat, usually beef, placed between two buns. It is often served with various toppings such as cheese, lettuce, tomato, and condiments.

name: Sushi
description: A dish consisting of vinegared rice combined with various ingredients such as raw fish, seafood, vegetables, and egg. It is usually served with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

name: Curry
description: A dish made with a combination of spices, herbs, and vegetables or meat. It is usually served with rice, naan bread, or other accompaniments.

name: Tacos
description: A traditional Mexican dish consisting of a corn or wheat tortilla filled with various ingredients such as beef, chicken, fish, or vegetables. It is usually served with salsa, guacamole, and other toppings.

name: Dim Sum
description: A style of Chinese cuisine consisting of small bite-sized portions of food served in steamer baskets or on small plates. It includes a variety of dishes such as dumplings, buns, and rolls, often served with tea.
